name: Point Of View (Sb7 Games)
description:
Ever imagined how it feels living alone, in an old cabin full of objects you don't even remember where they came from? Well maybe not but now you can.

Explore the vintage cabin in this puzzle-exploration game full of unknown adventures. Find the key that opens the door located at the last floor. You can find clues where the key might be at books, objects and even at the small wood located outside the house. Every time you find a clue to the key a save icon shows up/

GAME FEATURES
  • Atmospheric Visuals and Art Style
  • Abstract Story with Life Lessons
  • High Performance On Low Machines
  • Procedural Puzzle So Everyone Experiences Something Special
